home.name: Manish
home.intro:
I am a software engineer who loves technology, computers and everything gadgets. I enjoy building new things and relish the logical thinking that comes with it.
When I am not working, I like to ride my bike and explore new trails.

profile.name: Manish Reddy Nandineni
profile.bio: Building, researching, and exploring technology fuels my days. Bridging tech, products, policy, philosophy, and life's big questions, I seek diverse perspectives through stimulating conversations.

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer
roles.description: Leading critical customer service requests, I deliver impactful user stories in collaboration with product owners and stakeholders leveraging Java and other tools, ensuring seamless integration and enhancing the overall quality.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Transitioning to a key role, I focused on developing user stories and addressing critical defects within the Capital suite of software tools for EDA, contributing to the enhancement of product reliability and performance.

roles.title: Software Developer Intern
roles.description: Initiated as an intern, contributed to E/E system software projects for aerospace and defense. Primarily focused on Capital Data Migrate tool, rapidly upskilling and laying the foundation for my growth within the organization.

roles.title: Software Development Intern
roles.description: Enhanced testing efficiency by automating processes, reducing turnaround by 600%. Contributed to last-minute bug fixes leveraging Node.js and React, conducting end-to-end testing for the timely deployment of a women safety app in collaboration with the city's police department.

roles.title: Campus Lead
roles.description: Joined as a campus avenger in my freshman year at CMRCET's college magazine on stuMagz, contributing to the design team. Elevated to Campus Lead, continuing to actively contribute to the magazine's initiatives.

education.institution: Dexterity School of Leadership and Entrepreneurship

degrees.title: Leadership Development Program
degrees.description: Engaged in a comprehensive program spanning two semesters and twelve modules, providing in-depth digital mentoring. Graduated by participating in the rigorous final week-long residential training at IRMA, Anand.

degrees.title: Bachelor of Technology
degrees.description: Graduated with First Class with Distinction (CGPA: 8.34) in Computer Science & Engineering, specializing in data structures, algorithms, blockchain, and artificial intelligence. Represented CMRCET at national-level hackathons and competitions, including IASF, SCALE, and Smart India Hackathon.

degrees.title: Intermediate Education (Higher Secondary)
degrees.description: Completed high schooling under the Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education with an aggregate of 95%..

degrees.title: I.C.S.E. (Secondary School)
degrees.description: Completed secondary schooling with I.C.S.E. curriculum, securing a notable score of 84.6%. Served as the student president for the academic year 2015-16, and was awarded the Student of the Year for the class of 2016.

roles.title: General Secretary
roles.description: Pivotal in founding the college's first student council, shaping its structure and constitution. As General Secretary, coordinated activities, bridged communication between management and students, and mentored committee heads. Initiating fundraisers, I led the organization of the college's major annual festivals, Azura & Carpe Diem.

roles.title: President
roles.description: Championed a thriving programming culture by organizing intercollegiate hackathons and programming contests. Conducted multiple sessions on data structures, algorithms, and development for junior students. Successfully hosted major inter-college events, including 'Code League' and 'DevJam'.

roles.title: Volunteer
roles.description: Volunteered with the design team for four months, managing social media posts and amassing a following of over 300 followers. Coordinated and executed the event 'Being the Voice', dedicated to raising awareness on topics such as gender orientation and women empowerment.

interests.title: Blockchain
interests.description: Experienced in crafting blockchain solutions using Hyperledger Besu, Solidity, and Ethereum. My focus lies in building private blockchain networks tailored for transformative applications in academia and the public sector.

interests.title: Artificial Intelligence
interests.description: Certified IBM AI Engineer with expertise in SSDs and YOLO algorithms for image detection. Skilled in building deep learning models for scene analysis. Currently expanding my knowledge with a focus on SLMs.

interests.title: Digital Governance
interests.description: Passionate about the intersection of technology and policy. Eager to contribute to the development of products that facilitate effective governance. Experienced in working with non-profit organizations.

interests.title: Software Development
interests.description: Passionate about creating impactful products, I have hands-on experience building websites, applications and backend services. Currently honing my skills in crafting clean and efficient software for optimal user experiences.

interests.title: Smart Systems
interests.description: Extensive hands-on experience in developing Arduino and IoT projects. Worked under the esteemed guidance of Padmasri Chintakindi Mallesham to enhance the control unit and working of 'Laxmi Asu Machine' using Arduino.

interests.title: Motorcycling
interests.description: I'm an avid motorcycle enthusiast, exploring various outskirts of Hyderabad on frequent rides. Recently completed my longest solo ride, covering over 2100 kms. Always up for a chat about bikes and adventure.

portfolioItems.title: VeriCert
portfolioItems.description: A service for issuing and verifying digital academic credentials, constructed on private blockchain networks.

portfolioItems.title: Asu Machine Enhancement
portfolioItems.description: Improved Laxmi Asu Machine, enabled diverse fabric designs for Pochampally artisans using Arduino.

portfolioItems.title: DIY Portfolio
portfolioItems.description: A user-friendly, open-source portfolio website that can be cloned and personalized with a single config file modification.

portfolioItems.title: Linkz - URL Shortener
portfolioItems.description: A URL shortening service created utilizing Node.js, React.js, and MongoDB, with the option to customize the trailing part.

portfolioItems.title: Code Runner
portfolioItems.description: Free online compiler for C, C++, Java, and Python, boosts productivity with 2-second link generation and intuitive UI.

portfolioItems.title: De-cent Books
portfolioItems.description: An Ethereum Blockchain-based bookshop with decentralized e-commerce, employing Smart Contracts.
